projects.title: Identifying Fake News in Filipino Articles with Recurrent Neural Networks
projects.description: Investigated recurrent neural networks as a smaller alternative to transfer learning models for easier deployment of fake news classifiers in the Filipino language.

projects.title: Hotdog: A LOLCODE Interpreter
projects.description: A collaboratory project in CMSC 124 Design and Implementation of Programming Languages where I developed the backend of a LOLCODE interpreter.

projects.title: Raffler
projects.description: Raffler is a simple lottery app. Developed because I like that it is similar to Rappler.
